NUZVIDUThis document is a declaration of the I have handed over the title deed, EC, Aadhar card, PAN card etc. in my name to the undersigned for preparation. I hereby certify that this document has been prepared as per the information provided by the undersigned. If the above information is found to be false, neither the scribe who prepared this document nor the staff of the Registration Department shall be held responsible for it and I hereby certify that neither I nor my heirs etc. have transferred the property in this document to anyone. I hereby declare that if any misappropriation is found to have been committed in the future, I shall be held responsible under Section 22B of the Registration Act 1908 and I shall be liable under Section 82 of the Registration Act 1908. I hereby certify that the title deed, EC, Aadhar card, PAN card etc. provided by the undersigned in this document have been examined and the immovable property shown by them has been handed over to the clerk for the preparation of the document along with my Aadhar card and PAN card details. I hereby certify that this document has been prepared as per the information provided by the undersigned. If any of the information provided herein is untrue, neither the clerk who prepared this document nor the staff of the Registration Department office shall be held responsible for it and I hereby certify that I shall be liable for all legal action taken against me for that. boundaries.boundaryS: 55.3 Ft. Property of Gangavelli Satya Phanindra Naga Varalakshmi

sections.content:
The property covered under Sale Deed No. 920 of 2026, dated 27/Jan/2026, executed by Visvanadhuni Eeswaracharyulu in favour of Gantala Pushpavathi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 125.84 Sq. Yds (or) 1132.56 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 8-41 and Assessment Number 1441, comprised in survey number 334/1A , situated in Edara Village and Grama Panchayath, Agiripalle Mandal, erstwhile Krishna District, now within the District of Eluru, registered at sub-registrar office Nuzvidu, is bounded as follows:

North by: 55.3 Ft. Site of Medisetti Jayalakshmi 
South by: 55.3 Ft. Property of Gangavelli Satya Phanindra Naga Varalakshmi 
East by: 20.6 Ft. Site of  Kommuri Harika 
West by: 20.6 Ft. Panchayati Bazar

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 334/1, situated in Edara, measuring about 1331.29 Sq. yds. (or) 11981.61 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by Kotagiri Vijaya Rajeswari. [Ref: E.C] 2. The aforementioned Kotagiri Vijaya Rajeswari executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 25/Jun/2014, registered as document No. 3640 of 2014, before the SRO Nuzvidu, in favour of Gangavelli Satya Phanidra Naga Vara Lakshmi, towards the property measuring 1331.29 Sq. Yds. (or) 11981.61 Sq. Ft., comprised in survey no. 334/1, at Edara. [Ref: E.C] 3. The aforementioned Gangavelli Satya Phanidra Naga Vara Lakshmi executed a Sale Deed on 11/Jun/2021, registered as document No. 3073 of 2021, before the SRO Nuzvidu, in favour of Visvanadhuni Eeswaracharyulu, towards the property measuring 125.84 Sq. Yds. (or) 1132.56 Sq. Ft., comprised in survey no. 334/1A, situated at Edara. [Ref: E.C] 4. The aforementioned Visvanadhuni Eeswaracharyulu executed a Mortgage Deed on 01/Feb/2022, registered as document No. 786 of 2022, before the SRO Nuzvidu, in favour of M/S Shriram City Union Finance Limited, Nuzvid Branch, towards the property measuring 125.84 Sq. Yds. (or) 1132.56 Sq. Ft., situated in Edara, which was subsequently discharged vide Receipt Deed dated 17/Jan/2026, registered as document no. 551 of 2026. [Ref: E.C] 5. The aforementioned Visvanadhuni Eeswaracharyulu executed a Sale Deed on 27/Jan/2026, registered as document No. 920 of 2026, before the SRO Nuzvidu, in favour of Gantala Pushpavathi, towards the property measuring 125.84 Sq. Yds. (or) 1132.56 Sq. Ft., bearing house no. 8-41, comprised in survey no. 334/1A, situated at Edara. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : Note: It is to be noted that the HTR was not attached in this case, when the same is enquired with F.I., they reverted to release a conditional report. It is therefore advisable for F.I. to obtain HTR prior to the loan disbursement of the loan.
The mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner, Gantala Pushpavathi.

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Gantala Pushpavathi, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property admeasuring an extent of 125.84 Sq. Yds (or) 1132.56 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 8-41 and Assessment Number 1441, comprised in survey number 334/1A , situated in Edara Village and Grama Panchayath, Agiripalle Mandal, erstwhile Krishna District, now within the District of Eluru, registered at sub-registrar office Nuzvidu.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
